item.title: Winter Launch Event: What to expect from OnePlus 13 series launch on Jan 7 - Business Standard
item.description:
Winter Launch Event: What to Expect from OnePlus 13 Series on January 7

Publication Date: January 5, 2024 | Source: OnePlus Official Announcement

OnePlus is gearing up for the launch of its flagship OnePlus 13 series smartphones at the Winter Launch Event on January 7, with highlights including the OnePlus 13, OnePlus 13r, and new wireless earbuds.

Key Points:

  • The event will begin at 9 PM IST and will be livestreamed on YouTube.
  • OnePlus 13 will feature Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite processor and be available in three colors.
  • Specifications include a 6.82-inch AMOLED display, up to 24GB RAM, and dual IP68/IP69 ratings for water and dust resistance.
  • OnePlus 13r is expected to be a rebranded version of OnePlus Ace 5 with similar features and design.
  • New OnePlus Buds Pro 3 in Sapphire Blue will be launched, alongside magnetic charging accessories.

Notable Quotes or Statistics:

“Expect a new level of performance and design from the OnePlus 13 series, showcasing our commitment to innovation.”

Conclusion:

The Winter Launch Event promises exciting new products from OnePlus, emphasizing advanced technology and design, setting a benchmark for the smartphone market in 2024.

item.title: Realme 14 Pro series 5G to launch on January 16 with this India-exclusive feature: Details inside - The Financial Express
item.description:
Realme 14 Pro Series 5G Launching in India on January 16

Publication Date: January 12, 2024 Source: Financial Express

The Realme 14 Pro series 5G is set for a global launch on January 16, including an India-exclusive feature. The phones will showcase unique color-changing designs using thermochromic pigments.

  • The series includes Realme 14 Pro and Realme 14 Pro Plus.
  • Features an innovative pearl white color that changes to blue in cold temperatures.
  • Also available in India-exclusive colors: Bikaner Purple and Jaipur Pink.
  • Teased specs include a quad-curved display and Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 processor.
“These variants capture the essence of these historic Indian cities.” - Realme

The Realme 14 Pro series aims to differentiate itself with unique design features and specifications, appealing to the Indian market.

item.title: Best camera phones under ₹25000: Motorola Edge 50 Neo, Realme 13 Pro, and more | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Best Camera Phones Under ₹25000: Motorola Edge 50 Neo, Realme 13 Pro, and More

Date: Upcoming, Source: Live Mint

As e-commerce platforms gear up for sales around Republic Day, here’s a curated list of the best camera phones available under ₹25000 from brands like Motorola and Realme for those on a budget.

  • Motorola Edge 50 Neo: Boasts a 50 MP main camera, 13 MP ultrawide, and 10 MP telephoto lens, alongside a 32 MP selfie camera.
  • Realme 13 Pro: Features a 50 MP main camera with Sony LYT 600 sensor and a dual-camera setup, including a 32 MP selfie camera.
  • Nothing Phone 2a: Highlights include a unique design and a dual-camera system with two 50MP lenses.
  • OnePlus Nord CE 4: Equipped with a 50 MP main camera and 16 MP front-facing camera.
  • iQOO Z9s Pro: Features a dual camera setup with a 50MP main sensor and an 8 MP ultrawide lens.
“If you have a limited budget, but want a feature-filled smartphone with a good camera, then we have got you covered.”

With various options available, users can find a suitable camera phone without breaking the bank.

item.title: iPhone 16 selling at Rs 11,000 discount: All details here - India Today
item.description:
iPhone 16 Available at Rs 11,000 Discount: Details Inside

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: India Today

The iPhone 16 is currently being offered at a record low price on Flipkart, with discounts reaching up to Rs 11,000.

  • The iPhone 16 128GB model is on sale for Rs 72,900, reduced from Rs 79,900.
  • Customers can avail an additional Rs 4,000 discount with SBI and ICICI credit cards.
  • The iPhone 16 features advanced Apple Intelligence and the latest A18 chip for improved performance.
  • It includes a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR OLED display and a sophisticated camera system.
  • The device is also IP68-rated for water and dust resistance.
“Now, you can get up to Rs 11,000 off on the iPhone 16.”

This discount makes the iPhone 16 an attractive option for those looking to upgrade their smartphones.

item.title: iPhone 17 Air Could Be Thinner Than Samsung's Galaxy S25 Slim; Price Range Tipped - Gadgets 360
item.description:
iPhone 17 Air, Galaxy S25 Slim Thickness, Pricing Suggested in New Leak

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Gadgets360

Apple and Samsung are set to release their new slim flagship models this year, with rumored specifications and pricing details emerging ahead of their official announcements.

  • The iPhone 17 Air is expected to replace the Plus version in Apple's lineup, launching in September.
  • The Galaxy S25 Slim may be released later, with a rumored availability in the second or third quarter of the year.
  • iPhone 17 Air could have a thickness of 6.25mm, while Galaxy S25 Slim may feature a mid-6mm profile.
  • Pricing for iPhone 17 Air is expected to range between $1,299 and $1,500, higher than the iPhone 16 Plus.
  • Samsung is said to be applying new technology to reduce camera size in the upcoming models.
“The price of this model could be lower than that of the top-of-the-line Ultra model.”

This event highlights the competitive nature of the smartphone market as both companies aim to attract consumers with their latest innovations.

item.title: Luke Littler Won, Rafael Nadal Gay: Apple Intelligence Faces Fire Over Erroneous News Summaries - NDTV Profit
item.description:
Apple Intelligence Under Scrutiny Over Erroneous News Summaries

Publication Date: January 6, 2025

Source: Bloomberg Quint

Recent errors indicate that Apple Intelligence might require much more work before it can be trusted with providing accurate information in its AI summaries.

  • Apple's AI summary feature has been critiqued for significant errors, including false headlines about Luke Littler winning a match before it occurred.
  • Another false summary claimed tennis star Rafael Nadal had come out as gay.
  • Apple introduced this feature in iOS 18.2 to give users quick notifications without full content.
  • Apple acknowledged the errors and encouraged user feedback to improve the system.
  • Reporters Without Borders has called for Apple to disable the feature due to risks to accurate reporting.
“Apple has admitted the possibility of mistakes and encouraged users to report any inaccuracies.”

In light of these incidents, there are concerns regarding the reliability of Apple's AI news summaries, emphasizing the need for careful oversight and improvement in the technology used.

item.title: Wipro veteran quits for CEO role at smaller firm | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
Wipro veteran quits for CEO role at smaller firm

Publication Date: N/A, Source: Live Mint

Srini Rajamani, a senior executive at Wipro, has left the company to become CEO of Opus Technologies, a fintech firm based in the US. This marks a notable exit from the IT services giant.

  • Rajamani led Wipro's life sciences and consumer businesses.
  • Opus Technologies specializes in card management systems and payment gateways.
  • The firm has a workforce of around 800 employees, with offices in Pune, Hyderabad, the UK, US, and Canada.
“A senior Wipro Ltd executive overseeing a third of the company’s business has resigned.”

This departure is part of a trend of high-profile exits from Wipro, which may have implications for the company's future leadership and strategy.

item.title: LG 2025 OLED Evo TVs With Alpha 11 AI Processor Unveiled Ahead of CES 2025 - Gadgets 360
item.description:
LG Unveils 2025 Lineup of OLED Evo TVs Ahead of CES 2025

Published on: January 7, 2025, Source: Gadgets 360

LG has introduced its 2025 OLED Evo TVs in Seoul, featuring the new Alpha 11 processor and advanced AI functionality, aiming to enhance viewing experiences.

  • The 2025 OLED Evo TVs leverage AI Search for improved contextual understanding.
  • They feature Brightness Booster Ultimate technology, achieving up to three times higher brightness than conventional models.
  • Supports Filmmaker Mode with Ambient Light Compensation for optimized viewing in various lighting.
  • Gaming features include 165Hz VRR at 4K and reduced input lag up to 165 fps.
  • Awarded multiple certifications for color fidelity and image quality.
“The LG 2025 OLED Evo TVs not only enhance visual quality but also integrate cutting-edge AI to understand user preferences.” - LG's statement

These advancements showcase LG's commitment to pushing the boundaries of display technology while featuring numerous connectivity and audio enhancements.

item.title: LG Electronics unveiled its 2025 OLED TV range - OLED-Info
item.description:
LG Electronics Unveils 2025 OLED TV Range

Posted: Jan 06, 2025 by Ron Mertens

LG Electronics officially launched its 2025 OLED TV range, featuring four different series with advancements in technology and design.

  • The G5 and M5 models utilize a new 4-stack WOLED panel design, enhancing brightness and efficiency.
  • The OLED M5 is the flagship wireless 4K 144Hz OLED, available in multiple sizes up to 97 inches.
  • The OLED G5 offers 4K 165Hz panels and various sizes, but the 48-inch and 97-inch models run at 144Hz.
  • The budget-friendly OLED C5 includes 4K 144Hz WOLED panels in sizes ranging from 42 to 83 inches.
  • The entry-level OLED B5 features 4K 120Hz WOLED panels.
  • All 2025 OLED TVs operate on WebOS 25 with new Alpha processors.
  • Pricing and availability will be announced in Spring 2025.

item.title: Samsung introduces live translate, other AI features for TVs at CES 2025 - The Hindu
item.description:
Samsung introduces live translate, other AI features for TVs at CES 2025

Date: January 06, 2025 Source: The Hindu

Samsung has launched innovative AI features for its TV models, enhancing user experience with real-time functionalities.

  • The Live Translate feature offers real-time translation for closed captions during live broadcasts in seven languages.
  • “Click to Search” allows users to gather real-time information on people, objects, and locations recognized on screen.
  • New AI Karaoke will remove vocals from songs, letting users sing along with their smartphones acting as microphones.
  • AI-powered voice removal and audio subtitles are being introduced to aid visually impaired viewers by adjusting reading speed and isolating voices.
  • A dedicated AI button on TV remote controls enables quick access to shopping and recommendations.
“It can analyze subtitles, isolate voices, and adjust the reading speed for a seamless experience.”

Samsung's new AI features aim to elevate the functionality of their television lineup, although integration with older models remains unconfirmed.

item.title: iPhone 17 Air to be Slimmer Than Samsung S25 Slim: Report - Deccan Chronicle
item.description:
iPhone 17 Air to be Slimmer Than Samsung S25 Slim: Report

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

The tech industry is abuzz with rumors that Apple’s upcoming iPhone 17 Air will be slimmer than Samsung’s Galaxy S25 Slim, showcasing innovative designs.

  • The Galaxy S25 Slim is expected to be 6.5mm thick, while the iPhone 17 Air is rumored to be 6.25mm thick, making it Apple's thinnest phone to date.
  • Samsung’s S25 Slim will feature a 200MP main camera and two additional cameras, while the iPhone 17 Air will have a single 48MP rear camera.
  • The S25 Slim is powered by Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and will have a battery capacity of 4700mAh to 5000mAh.
  • Apple's iPhone 17 Air is expected to be revealed in September alongside the entire iPhone 17 lineup.
“The iPhone 17 Air will be around 6.25mm thick, making it the thinnest iPhone ever.”

This competition in design and features highlights the ongoing rivalry between Apple and Samsung in the smartphone market.

item.title: Samsung Tipped To Make Advanced Cameras For iPhone 18 Pro Model: Know More - News18
item.description:
Samsung Tipped To Make Advanced Cameras For iPhone 18 Pro Model: Know More

Date: January 06, 2025

Source: News18

Samsung is looking to upgrade the camera technology for future iPhone models, with potential developments being observed for the iPhone 18 expected to launch in 2026.

  • Reports indicate that Samsung is developing a three-layer stacked sensor for the upcoming Apple iPhones.
  • This could mark a shift from Sony, which has had exclusive contracts for Apple’s camera sensors for over a decade.
  • The new sensor is designed to provide faster signal processing speeds and improved image quality, especially in low-light conditions.
  • The iPhone 18 may feature a 48-MP sensor and Apple’s next-gen A20 chipset.
  • Samsung is also developing a 500MP camera sensor for its own Galaxy devices.
“This new sensor, which reportedly has a PD-TR-Logic configuration, is expected to outperform Sony's Exmor RS image sensors.”

In summary, the collaboration between Samsung and Apple on the iPhone 18's camera technology could lead to significant advancements in mobile photography.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25, Galaxy S25 Ultra Leaked Renders Suggest Colour Options - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 and S25 Ultra Leaked Renders Show New Colors

Publication Date: January 5, 2025 Source: Gizmochina

The Samsung Galaxy S25 series is expected to launch globally this month, showcasing the Galaxy S25, S25+, and the Ultra variant, featuring Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.

  • The leaked renders reveal a blue color option called Icy Blue for the Galaxy S25 and Titanium Blue for the S25 Ultra.
  • Both models feature a design that supports magnetic wireless charging with a MagSafe-like ring.
  • The Galaxy S25 series will have slim bezels and centered hole-punch front cameras.
  • Expected color options include diverse choices such as mint, coral red, and titanium colors for the Ultra variant.
"Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2025 Could Take Place on January 22"

The leaks keep building anticipation for the launch of these new flagship models.

item.title: Redmi 14C 5G launched: Unboxing, quick review of affordable 5G phone from Xiaomi with Qualcomm chip, 50MP camera - The Financial Express
item.description:
Redmi 14C 5G launched: Unboxing, quick review of affordable 5G phone from Xiaomi with Qualcomm chip, 50MP camera

Date & Source: January 10, 2025, Financial Express

Xiaomi has launched the Redmi 14C 5G smartphone in India, enhancing its 5G lineup with a more powerful and efficient device designed for mass accessibility.

  • The Redmi 14C is available in 4/64GB, 4/128GB, and 6/128GB variants priced at Rs 9,999, Rs 10,999, and Rs 11,999 respectively.
  • It features Qualcomm's Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 processor for improved performance over the Redmi A4.
  • The smartphone supports fast download speeds of up to 2.5 Gbps on 5G networks.
  • Camera specifications include a 50MP rear camera and an 8MP front camera.
  • It has a large 6.88-inch LCD display with a 720p resolution and a 120Hz refresh rate.
  • The device is powered by a 5160 mAh battery, with a bundled 33W charger.
“If the Redmi A4 5G caught your attention, the Redmi 14C 5G is a no-brainer.”

The Redmi 14C 5G combines affordability with impressive features, solidifying Xiaomi's commitment to making 5G accessible for all.

item.title: Itel A80 entry segment smartphone with Unisoc processor launched in India - The Hindu
item.description:
Itel A80 Entry Segment Smartphone with Unisoc Processor Launched in India

Date: January 06, 2025 Source: The Hindu

Transsion Holdings-owned Itel has launched the A80 smartphone aimed at entry-level buyers in India, offering attractive specs at a competitive price.

  • 6.67-inch punch hole display with a 120 Hz refresh rate.
  • IP54-rated for dust and splash resistance.
  • Powered by Unisoc T603 processor with 4 GB RAM and 128 GB storage, plus a virtual RAM option.
  • 5,000 mAh battery with a 10 W charger included.
  • Camera setup includes a 50 MP rear camera and an 8 MP front camera.
  • Available in three colors: Sandstone Black, Glacier White, and Wave Blue.
  • Priced at ₹6,999.
“The Itel A80 is targeted at entry segment buyers looking for quality features at an affordable price.”

This launch indicates the company's commitment to providing value-driven smartphones in the competitive Indian market.

item.title: Garena Free Fire Max redeem codes released today offer variety of free rewards - India TV News
item.description:
Garena Free Fire Max Redeem Codes Released Today Offer Free Rewards

Publication Date: January 6, 2025
Source: India TV News

Players can unlock a variety of in-game rewards with the latest redeem codes released for Free Fire Max. These rewards significantly enhance gameplay.

Key Points:

  • Redeem codes for Free Fire Max provide various in-game rewards.
  • Players redeem codes on the Free Fire website with codes consisting of 12-16 alphanumeric characters.
  • The codes are time-sensitive and may be region-restricted.
  • Detailed list of redeem codes provided for January 6, 2025.
  • Instructions on how to redeem codes are given for players.
  • Free Fire has been banned in India since 2022, but Free Fire Max remains available.
“If everything goes smoothly, you'll receive your rewards within 24 hours after redeeming the code successfully.”

This update from Garena showcases continuous efforts to engage players despite previous setbacks with the game's availability.

item.title: It is revealed that vivo is preparing Dimensity 9400 tablet: it will be released with X200 Ultra in April – Passionategeekz - Passionategeekz
item.description:
Vivo Plans to Launch Dimensity 9400 Tablet Alongside X200 Ultra in April

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Passionategeekz

Vivo is set to unveil a new tablet powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 9400 chip, scheduled for release alongside the vivo X200 Ultra in April 2025.

  • Vivo is currently selling multiple tablet models including the vivo Pad 3, vivo Pad Air, and iQOO Pad Air.
  • The Dimensity 9400 chip was launched globally by the vivo X200 series and is described as a flagship 5G smart AI chip.
  • The device will be part of a product lineup that includes three flagship phones and a round vivo watch.
  • The vivo X200 Ultra will feature the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite mobile platform, while the “S” series models will retain the Dimensity 9400.
“The MediaTek Dimensity 9400 chip is the second generation full-core SoC of the Dimensity series.”

This upcoming launch highlights Vivo's commitment to advancing its tablet offerings in the competitive tech market.

item.title: CES 2025: LG brings OLED evo TVs with built-in AI, new lifestyle projectors - Business Standard
item.description:
LG Unveils OLED evo TVs and Lifestyle Projectors at CES 2025

Publication Date: January 2025

Source: Consumer Electronics Show

LG has introduced its latest 2025 OLED evo TV lineup and new lifestyle projectors, showcasing advancements in AI-powered features and display technology.

Key highlights include:

  • Introduction of true wireless OLED evo M5 and OLED evo G5 models.
  • Brightness Booster Ultimate technology for enhanced brightness.
  • AI features including AI Welcome, AI Voice ID, and AI Search for personalization.
  • New lifestyle projectors combining Bluetooth speakers and LED mood lamps.
“The new OLED evo 4K TVs include an updated Filmmaker Mode with Ambient Light Compensation.”

This launch marks a significant step in LG's product innovation, focusing on enhancing the user experience through technology and design.

item.title: OnePlus 13, OnePlus 13R Launches Tomorrow In India: Price, Full Specs, How To Watch Live Event On Jan 7 - Times Now
item.description:
OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R Launching Tomorrow in India

Publication Date: January 6, 2025   Source: TNN

The OnePlus 13 series is set to debut in India tomorrow, featuring the flagship OnePlus 13 and the budget-friendly OnePlus 13R.

  • The launch event will be streamed live on January 7, 2025, at 7:30 PM IST via OnePlus’s official website and YouTube channel.
  • The expected price of the OnePlus 13 is under Rs 70,000, while the OnePlus 13R may be priced under Rs 50,000.
  • Both models have a refreshed design with flat displays, diverging from the previous curved ones.
  • The OnePlus 13 is powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset; the 13R uses Snapdragon 8 Gen 3.
  • Both devices feature a 6,000mAh battery and fast-charging support.
  • The OnePlus 13 guarantees 4 years of Android updates, while the 13R promises 3 years.
“Both the OnePlus 13 and the OnePlus 13R aim to provide flagship performance at competitive prices.”

In conclusion, the OnePlus 13 series aims to position itself strongly in the Indian smartphone market with offerings that cater to both premium and budget-conscious consumers.

item.title: Realme 14 Pro 5G Series India Launch Date Confirmed; Key Features Leaked - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Realme 14 Pro 5G Series India Launch Date Confirmed; Key Features Leaked

Date: January 16, 2024

Source: Gadgets 360

The Realme 14 Pro 5G series is set to launch in India on January 16, 2024. The company has disclosed significant features and leaked specifications through promotional materials.

  • The series will feature a base model and a Plus variant.
  • Confirmed colors include Pearl White, Suede Grey, Bikaner Purple, and Jaipur Pink.
  • It boasts the slimmest bezels in its segment and the world's first triple flash unit.
  • Both models will be equipped with 6,000mAh batteries with various fast charging capabilities (45W for base and 80W for Plus).
  • The main camera of the base model will feature a 50MP Sony IMX882 sensor; the Plus variant will have additional camera specifications.
“The Realme 14 Pro will include an OIS-supported 50-megapixel primary sensor with 4K video recording support.”

In conclusion, the Realme 14 Pro 5G series promises innovative features and design, appealing to tech enthusiasts in India.

item.title: Flipkart Offer: Smart TVs Available Under Just Rs 9,000 – Hurry! Grab THESE Best Deals At Half Price NOW - News24
item.description:
Flipkart Offer: Smart TVs Available Under Just Rs 9,000 – Hurry! Grab THESE Best Deals At Half Price NOW

Date: January 06, 2025 | Source: News24

Flipkart is presenting fantastic deals on 32-inch smart TVs, all priced below INR 9,000, with discounts reaching up to 57%. Here are the top picks of the best deals available:

  • Infinix 32-inch HD Ready LED Smart TV: Price: INR 8,499 (originally INR 16,999), with EMI discounts available.
  • KODAK Special Edition 32-inch HD Ready LED Smart TV: Price after up to 44% discount, with EMI discounts available.
  • TCL 32-inch HD Ready LED Smart Android TV: Price: INR 8,990 (originally INR 20,990), featuring an incredible 57% discount.

As the festive season approaches, these deals present an excellent opportunity for upgrading your entertainment setup.

“A brilliant blend of affordability and superior technology is literally at your fingertips.”
